comment._content:
Charles Hardinge, 1st Baron Hardinge of Penshurst

Viceroy of India from 1910 to 1916

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is Hardinge page on Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viscount_Hardinge this may be: Henry Charles Hardinge, 3rd Viscount Hardinge of Lahore and Kings Newton1 M, #14480, b. 1 August 1857, d. 30 April 1924 www.thepeerage.com/p1448.htm#i14480

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
LeoLondon: Thank you for your comment! It does appear based on captions of other images of Hardinge in our collections that you have identified Baron Hardinge correctly.  He was a British diplomat and lived from 1858 to 1944.  We will add a bit more information when we update the record. 

Harry Angstrom: This Hardinge is in fact Charles Hardinge, 1st Baron Hardinge of Penshurst, 1858-1944. Other captioned photos of him in our non-digitized holdings confirm his identity.  Thank you for your comment as well!
